hymn.title: I called upon Thy name, O Lord

layout.singingstanza: I called up -- on Thy name, O Lord, Out of a low dun -- geon. Thou hast heard my voice, O Lord, Thou hast heard my voice: Hide not Thine ear at my breath -- ing, at my cry. Hide not Thine ear at my breath -- ing, at my cry.

lyrics.stanza: I called upon Thy name, O Lord, Out of a low dungeon. Thou hast heard my voice, O Lord, Thou hast heard my voice: Hide not Thine ear at my breathing, at my cry. Hide not Thine ear at my breathing, at my cry.
